reviews.review: A very good game. It explains a few things so you don't have to play portal 1 to understand it ! :)
非常好玩，特别是双人合作，就是关卡太少太短了，几个小时就结束了。

Интересная игра. 
- Приятная механика
- Игра выглядит приятно даже в 2020
- Интересные задачки
- Приятная озвучка

Вобщем, рекомендую.
갓겜이라 불리는 건 이유가 있음 포탈1 하고 나서 했으면 더 재미있었을듯
i love it me and my brother love portal and portal2
Всем советую эта игра просто шедевральная. Во-первых очень радует что есть кооператив а также одиночная игра с крутым сюжетом.В кооперативе тоже есть сюжет.Игра класс советую пройти)
Hilarious story / narration and fun and challenging puzzles. Was pleasantly surprised by this series.
AMAZING!  SO MUCH FUN WITH FREINDS!
This game is worth it believe me.

打折买后放了挺久，到现在终于玩通。
推荐，作为解密游戏难度平衡的挺好，而且规则也易懂，另外还有着贯穿全篇的不错的剧情和各种彩蛋。
单人剧情模式玩通，接下来再试试多人。
Прекрасная, интересная, атмосферная и вечная игра от Вольво. Очень рад тому, что однажды с ней познакомился.

Amazing! even better than the first one a lot more story, new characters, and new obstacles in the testing chambers. Also the price is amazing, 10 dollars. The graphics are amazing especially for 2012, I really recommend this game if you haven't played it

oyun çok eğlenceli ve bulmacalarla dolu oyun hem zekanızı test ettiriyor hemde oyun becerilerinizi geliştiriyor kesinlikle almanızı ve oynamanızı öneririm arkadaşlarınızla oynarsanız dahada eğlenceli olur
hay hay shooty the portaly to the end i win yay
fun, chilling, brain twisting (in a great way) and so many options!
this game is amazing. The story is realy well made. It has a lot of funny moments. And overall its an amazing game.
当时打折3块钱买的，性价比格外高！尤其是双人模式很考验默契，目前玩过最好玩的游戏，没有之一
i love the comedy of glados, shes queen. and its fun to kill your friend in cooperative :) glados thinks im a good boi
Рекомендую прошёл игру с начала и до конца графон и геймплей мне нравится покупайте не пожалеете
brabo demais mano, a história é fodona e dps q vc termina de jogar seu qi é 240
Portal 2 is as good if not better than the first game.
An OG gamee thats truly a masterpiece that'll never get old. An absolute gem of a game
Bro, its PORTAL 2. Go play it already

Pense que habia hecho una reseña a este juego pero luego me di cuenta que solo dije una tonteria en fin.

PORTAL 2
la continuación del portal

-Uno de los mejores juegos puzzles que se trata de portales,cubos,torretas,una inteligencia artificial que te tira cagada todo el rato y mas.

-También tiene un modo cooperativo que también es muy bueno y también la posibilidad de traicionar a tu compañero.

-Una historia muy buena que se enlaza con la historia de los juegos half life.

-Un modo de probar camaras creadas por la comunidad por lo que añade mucho tiempo de juego.

-y para correrlo no necesitas una pc fuerte, les digo que tengo una pc del gobierno de mexico y me jalo a 30 fps.

-Lamentablemente como es valve jamas sacaran portal 3.

el juego esta super bueno me gusto mucho la historia y las mecanicas que complementan las del primer juego.la historia es genial desde que empiezas el juego hasta que termina y el multijugador presenta una historia diferente y atrapante, el unico problema que tuve en este es que el otro dia tenia mal internet y un argentino me agarro a puteas porque se me pego y se murio y perdimos.
3块钱啊！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！绝好的剧情！！愣着干嘛，还不快冲？
i play it when i was 5 and now that im now 18 and it still hold up that says something
It's Portal 2, what else do I have to say?
best game 10/10 would play again, am downloading it again to play it as i write this. i should stop writing cuz my internet is shit

Excelente juego, los personajes tienen mucho carisma, (menos chell por razones obvias), 
la dificultad de los puzzles es media, satisfactoria en mi opinion y pues no se le doy 8/10.
oyun çok iyi tavana ve yere portal gun sıkıp sonsuza kadar aşşağı düşebiliyorum
Игра оставила в основном положительные эмоции, но есть косяки с Русской озвучкой в виде: рандомных кусков реплик в середине кац сцены и страных переодических шумов.
one of the best games i ever played
aunque sea muy repetitivo se siente satisfactorio jugarlo le doy un 9 de 10
Hem oynanış olsun hemde hikaye olsun 10/10 oyun bitirdikten sonra hayatı sorgulayarak outro yu  izledim 2 oyun da her türlü paraya değer.
This game has made me cry. Twice. Maybe even more. And I mean that in the best way possible. I'm a few years late, but please play it, highly recommended <3
Very good game. Story is probably the best thing, and playing with friends is also pretty fun. Just don't play co-op if you have dumb friends.
Very fun puzzles, that have a pleasent difficulty
One of the best single player games someone can play. If you want a fun puzzle game, this is for you.
it's a great puzzle game with an amazing story continued from the first game, and with lots of post-game content, and even multiplater
very fun game would play again (Which I have) I recommend it to you and whoever says it's bad is just bad at the game
cool puzzle game great for singleplayer and multiplayer
